data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Charleroi get the game underway.
Smail Prevljak scores to make it 1-0 at Kehrweg Stadium.
The first-half is over at Kehrweg Stadium.
In the minute 45, Steeven Willems (Charleroi) gets a yellow card.
It's Eupen with the kick-off after the break.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Ortwin De Wolf with Theo Defourny.
Nicolas Penneteau has the misfortune to make it 2-0 through an own goal.
Charleroi's Guillaume Gillet has been booked in Eupen.
In the minute 61, Charleroi make their first substitution with Shamar Nicholson replacing Marco Ilaimaharitra.
Saido Berahino is replacing Jules Van Cleemput for Charleroi at Kehrweg Stadium.
Amara Baby is replacing Smail Prevljak for the home team.
In the minute 70, Ryota Morioka (Charleroi) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! Eupen extend their lead to 3-0 through Mamadou Fall.
Jonathan Heris is on a sub for Adriano for Eupen.
In the minute 84, The away team have replaced Kaveh Rezaei with Ken Nkuba. This is the third substitution made today by Karim Belhocine.
Goal! Charleroi reduce the deficit to 3-1 through Kayembe.
At Kehrweg Stadium, Ali Gholizadeh has been yellow-carded for the away team.
It's 3-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
